sentences: Gustaf Peter Lundblad (26 August 1950 – 22 December 2015) was a Swedish singer and songwriter, well known for his 1986 song Ta mig till havet.
In 1978, Lundblad and Torbjörn wrote and recorded the song Who Will Comfort Toffle?
Together with Agneta Olsson, Lundblad competed in Melodifestivalen 1983 with the song Vill du ha mig efter gryningen.
